title: Vitamin C Brightening Serum
description: A powerful antioxidant serum that brightens skin tone, reduces dark spots, and promotes a radiant complexion. Infused with 20% pure Vitamin C and hyaluronic acid.
keyIngredients: Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E

title: Hydrating Facial Cleanser
description: Gentle, sulfate-free cleanser that removes impurities while maintaining skin's natural moisture barrier. Perfect for daily use morning and night.

title: Retinol Night Cream
description: Anti-aging night cream with encapsulated retinol to reduce fine lines and wrinkles. Promotes cell turnover for smoother, younger-looking skin.

title: Oil-Free Moisturizer
description: Lightweight, non-comedogenic moisturizer that hydrates without clogging pores. Ideal for oily and combination skin types.

title: Exfoliating Face Mask
description: Weekly treatment mask with natural clay and fruit enzymes to deeply cleanse pores and reveal brighter, smoother skin.
keyIngredients: Kaolin Clay, Papaya Enzymes, Jojoba Beads

title: Eye Renewal Cream
description: Targeted treatment for the delicate eye area. Reduces puffiness, dark circles, and fine lines with caffeine and peptides.

title: Mineral SPF 50 Sunscreen
description: Broad-spectrum mineral sunscreen that protects against UVA/UVB rays. Non-greasy formula suitable for sensitive skin.
keyIngredients: Zinc Oxide, Titanium Dioxide, Vitamin E

title: Nourishing Face Oil
description: Luxurious blend of botanical oils that deeply nourishes and restores skin's natural glow. Perfect for dry or mature skin.
